attributes.action: Save the Post Office, Hannon Road , Aylesbury
attributes.additional_details:
The post office in Hannon Road, Aylesbury is due to close 31st Decenber 2011.
This is a most valuable asset to the local community.
The option for all the users when this closes is to travel into Aylesbury.
Having used the Post Office on a very regular basis I have seen that this would put unbelievable pressure on a high percentage of its customers.
I spent over £600 in the past year at the office and have always had a very good, personal service.
Please sign this petition and try to save this very essential service to the local area.
